routes.name: Crude Oil and Natural Gas Drilling Activity
routes.description: Rotary Rigs in Operation: Baker Hughes, Inc.,  Houston, TX,  "North America Rig Count," used with permission. See http://phx.corporate-ir.net/phoenix.zhtml?c=79687&p=irol-reportsother.  Active Well Service Rig Count: Energy Workforce & Technology Council, Houston, TX.  Rotary rigs in operation are reported weekly. Monthly data are averages of 4- or 5-week reporting periods, not calendar months. Annual data are averages over 52 or 53 weeks, not calendar year. Published data are rounded to the nearest whole number. Geographic coverage is the 50 States and the District of Columbia.

routes.name: Crude Oil and Natural Gas Exploratory and Development Wells
routes.description: Geographic coverage is the 50 States and the District of Columbia.

routes.name: Maximum U.S. Active Seismic Crew Counts
routes.description: "48 States" is the United States excluding Alaska and Hawaii. "48 States, Offshore" are Federal and State Jurisdiction waters of the Gulf of Mexico. Alaska is all onshore. Total crews includes crews with unknown survey dimension. Data are reported on the first and fifteenth of each month, except January when they are reported only on the fifteenth. When semi-monthly values differ for the month, the larger of the two values is shown here. Consequently, this table reflects the maximum number of crews at work at any time during the month.

routes.name: Footage Drilled for Crude Oil and Natural Gas Wells
routes.description: Totals may not equal sum of components due to independent rounding.

routes.name: Average Depth of Crude Oil and Natural Gas Wells
routes.description: Average depth may not equal averaging of components due to independent rounding.

routes.name: Costs of Crude Oil and Natural Gas Wells Drilled
routes.description: *In chained (2000) dollars, calculated by using gross domestic product price deflators.
